short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily fill text fields with a randomly generated UUID!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UUID Filler takes the hassle of manually copy-pasting a UUID from a generator to text fields! With two clicks, easily fill a text field with a randomly generated UUIDV4!
